data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DEju4rt8x94Q7kNvgF503oD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAhXxdmgTd1b3UnQeFYCgUINy6gLzXsPDKhS9KliBfrbQ&oe=66A3891C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cvUy_f8PJLcQ7kNvgE29-Pl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZwMJfvrASCAgU_ZglBZvcTBfel-4pKAPff-j5YrtphQ&oe=66A392A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=F-MD2AP6vswQ7kNvgEMrlrt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBjgZmzf7OdiJI4llxPpK2_kbqkC-FyC7UnWsBGQr9Vmg&oe=66A37A07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=snnC9aDXKZoQ7kNvgEMsE2s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYARcq1-oAmyK_hfsLH6lHIRSB4mrYoGYghXpc0MISPVaA&oe=66A36CE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SwAH1fDESZcQ7kNvgEcYgz6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAPSqdkZnorwgDFB0uN1FjZwBEp54A0PN53XbsRuylM-Q&oe=66A39958)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ADrMOP3BQwMQ7kNvgEUAMe1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgr3NukNEP8h0DVx_tTMWcHZBlwp_03N3970389OcpLw&oe=66A395D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QQRiwSWO_HoQ7kNvgHeMdRL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpwf-4s1oZAHHAWdmhwRS2Runb97pjKHNi7-QIW65Ejw&oe=66A37BF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KRfv55D_wckQ7kNvgH4-PDy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB98Qj-0wupnE13kMxy-EGGrWXHDorzATvExoBpXuiYdA&oe=66A3666A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dPsMmp7JQOsQ7kNvgE487WD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmQs59Lj0xpiAjS3GrvDkgyphKn5Qu1tFIVT_tXLTbpQ&oe=66A37A17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vSgyNMuRCwcQ7kNvgESa_Hq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBniq6eIyh6w5yTr1KwOxZ34c7SjdPxUYQYMwOEo7iypA&oe=66A3958C)
